game.name: TS Marketplace: FahrBAR Charity Coach Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Enjoy a nice drink and take in stunning scenery on relaxing Swiss rail journeys; the unique and legendary Projekt fahrBAR coach comes to Train Simulator Classic courtesy of Rivet Games!
